sources.title: Anna Karenina | Full Movie | Romantic Drama | Complete Mini Series
sources.description:
Anna Karenina - Set in late-19th-century Russia high-society, the aristocrat Anna Karenina enters into a life-changing affair with the affluent and handsome Count Vronsky. Tolstoy's novel adaptation.
2013.  Stars: Vittoria Puccini, Santiago Cabrera, Benjamin Sadler, Max von Thun

sources.title: Anna Karenina. Chuyện kể của Vronsky
sources.description:
1904 Chiến tranh Nga-Nhật. Mãn Châu. Bệnh viện quân đội Nga, đang rút lui, chiếm một ngôi làng Trung Quốc gần như bị bỏ hoang. Giám đốc bệnh viện, Sergei Karenin, biết rằng viên sĩ quan bị thương mà ông đang phẫu thuật, Bá tước Vronsky, chính là kẻ đã giết mẹ ông, Anna Karenina, và gián tiếp gây ra cái chết của cha ông. Không ảo tưởng và không mong đợi câu trả lời, Karenin vẫn đến gặp Vronsky và hỏi câu hỏi đã dằn vặt anh cả đời: điều gì đã khiến mẹ anh vượt qua ranh giới? Đến lượt mình, Bá tước Vronsky biết rằng bác sĩ chính là Seryozha Karenin. Sau một lúc do dự, bá tước đồng ý kể câu chuyện về mối tình bi thảm của mình với Anna Karenina, lưu ý rằng mọi người chỉ nhớ những gì thuận tiện để họ nhớ...

Năm phát hành: 2017

Giám đốc: Shakhnazarov Karen
Biên kịch: Shakhnazarov Karen, Buzin Alexey
Sáng tác: Poteenko Yury
Người điều hành: Kuznetsov Alexander
Nhà thiết kế sản xuất: Julia Makushina, Sergey Fevralev

Diễn viên: Tatyana Lyutaeva, Vladimir Ilyin, Alexei Vertkov, Elizaveta Boyarskaya, Maxim Matveev, Vitaly Kishchenko, Ivan Kolesnikov, Anastasia Makeeva, Kirill Grebenshchikov, Makar Mikhalkin, Yury Belyaev, Dmitry Gusev, Sofia Sun

sources.title: Anna Karenina, Part Eight | ORIGINAL SERIES | by Karen Shakhnazarov
sources.description:
A large-scale adaptation of Russian classics - a multi-part film based on the great novel by Leo Nikolayevich Tolstoy "Anna Karenina"

1904 Russo-Japanese War. Manchuria. The Russian military hospital, retreating, occupies a semi-abandoned Chinese village. The head of the hospital, Sergei Karenin, learns that the wounded officer he is operating on, earl Vronsky, is the one who killed his mother, Anna Karenina, and indirectly caused the death of his father. Having no illusions and not expecting an answer, Karenin nevertheless goes to Vronsky and asks the question that has tormented him all his life: what made his mother cross the line? earl Vronsky, in turn, learns that the doctor is the same Seryozha Karenin. After some hesitation, the count agrees to tell the story of his tragic love for Anna Karenina, noting that people remember only what is convenient for them to remember...

Part One: https://youtu.be/gVs6tzE4I8o
Part Two: https://youtu.be/K8FJ9DPXnd0
Part Three: https://youtu.be/HEqMWE52oQE
Part Four: https://youtu.be/ZaQn-iEL_qQ
Part Five: https://youtu.be/ZeDBSFnNSgM
Part Six: https://youtu.be/AFhRa7ROpHU
Part Seven: https://youtu.be/IeLJqvZcEqY

Year of production: 2017

Directed by: Karen Shakhnazarov
Written by: Karen Shakhnazarov, Alexey Buzin
Director of photography: Kuznetsov Alexander
Music: Poteeenko Yuri
Set Designers: Yulia Makushina, Sergey Fevralev
Starring: Elizaveta Boyarskaya, Maxim Matveev, Vitaly Kishchenko, Kirill Grebenshchikov, Makar Mikhalkin

#AnnaKarenina #RussianDrama #FullMovie #Literature

metadata.Plot: In 1874, in the Imperial Russia, the aristocratic Anna Karenina travels from Saint Petersburg to Moscow to save the marriage of her brother Prince Oblonsky, who had had a love affair with his housemaid. Anna Karenina has a cold marriage with her husband, Count Alexei Karenin, and they have a son. Anna meets the cavalry officer Count Vronsky at the train station and they feel attracted by each other. Soon she learns that Vronsky will propose to Kitty, who is the younger sister of her sister-in-law Dolly. Anna satisfactorily resolves the infidelity case of her brother and Kitty invites her to stay for the ball. However, Anna Karenina and Vronsky dance in the ball, calling the attention of the conservative society. Soon they have a love affair that will lead Anna Karenina to a tragic fate.
metadata.Actors: Keira Knightley, Jude Law, Aaron Taylor-Johnson
